page.title: 19ARTS,CRAFTS,CLUBS LEADENHAM
page.content: ARTS & CRAFTS A great deal of craft work is carried on in the area.Most of this is done at hobby level but in many cases of a very high standard.Beautiful examples of needlecraft,knitting and crochet are exhibited regularly.Cake artistry is taught as well as done.Woodwork and metal work are also very fine.Classes in arts & crafts are held in the Secondary School in Welbourn CLUBS The usual cry is that there is nothing to do in the village.This is not strictly true.There is quite a wide variety of clubs for most ages.These include the weekly Youth Club,the fortnightly Over 60's group and the monthly Women's Institute.There is a lively Aerobics Group meeting twice a week and Bingo every Friday. All meet in the Village Hall.
